name: Fuzzy Saucer: Pizza and Poop Edition
name_original: Fuzzy Saucer: Pizza and Poop Edition
description:
Fuzzy Saucer: Pizza and Poop Edition starring Lyle!

Lyle was once a happy cat, living alone in her unicorn castle. The days would pass by and all would be well in her kingdom. One day, a dark force entered the realm leaving behind a trail of poop wherever it may roam.

It is now up to Unicorn Queen Lyle to clean up her kingdom and track down whomever may be causing all the distress. All while fueling up on the food of the gods, Pizza.
